item.description:
This meetup group has been going on since last summer, and many of us have made become really good friends through these meetups. We're finding that many of us aren't quite so new to Rhode Island or the group anymore, and we'd like to give the "real" new people a chance to meet each other and get connected to the group.

So...please join the Newcomers group for a night of pool and drinks at Snookers this Tuesday, March 4th.
item.name: Not-So-Newcomers Meet Newer Newcomers
